channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose Gas Grid Making Noise All Day, 31st August
item.description:
It has been like this for the past month and has not been fixed. The grid is that loose that every time a car passes by it makes a loud noise. It's very frustrating as I am working from home but it's even worse when it wakes us up at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Endymion Road, Stroud Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste poorly managed by garage, 31st August
item.description:

item.title: What this cover is hiding?, 31st August
item.description:
Not sure if are bicycles, and hope are not something else. But are there since all summer now. The cover is blocking part of the pathway in-front of the school entrance. Please investigate

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gayhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown weeds disabled bay, 31st August
item.description:
Reported previously to lewisham, over month ago. BLASHFORD STREET SE136UA is over grown through out the road with weeds constantly dirty with food waste or dumped take away. But the disabled bay needs clearing the most as it is a huge safety hazard with the weeds growing so high!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blashford Street, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement really poor, uneven and dangerous., 31st August
item.description:
All the slabs are really uneven and dangerous. An elderly lady tripped last week and my son has also tripped walking to the car and cut his leg open. All around the green needs sorting before more people are hurt.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Place Farm Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree needs maintenance, 31st August
item.description:
Please can you send your annual refusal to maintain the trees on this road so I can submit my house insurance renewal. Can you also include that you’re not not cutting back at the base of the trees causing damage to cars and blocking parking spaces.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rowden Road, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Drain STILL blocked, 31st August
item.description:
The drain outside 139 Beaumont rd has been blocked for several years and there is no plan in place to unblock it!!! When a torrential spell of rain comes the water backs up and overflows the pavement and pours down the driveway at 137. It needs fixing not looking at and saying it’s fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beaumont Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow Box - fading, 31st August
item.description:
Outside the Gym, there is an area that has in the past been painted with a Yellow Hashed Box. The paint has worn out and is barley visible, the result is that people park and leave their cars, some times even blocking all access in and out of the sports centre & the park land . So no emergency services could access. Please repaint the box and enforce it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crompton Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge blocking path, 31st August
item.description:
This hedge is overgrown to an extent that it covers more than half the pathway. It makes it dangerous and difficult for people to pass through.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Broke Walk, Hackney, London
